Self-healing screen Broken glass smartphone, long repair or even the purchase of a new gadget - all in the past thanks to a new development from Motorola. Headset for smartphone - finger If you are not surprised enough, then it's time to tell you about a special invention - this ring on your finger. As you guessed, it's unusual. It will help to use your own fingers like headphones! When a call comes on the cell phone, all you need to do is put a finger with the ring to your ear.
